messages.aiCrownTreatmentNotesPartFour: If your case doesn’t meet all the requirements, request a manual design instead.
messages.aiCrownTreatmentNotesPartOne: For single or multiple non-adjacent crowns, use AI to get a design in minutes.
messages.aiCrownTreatmentNotesPartThree:
Requirements:
  • Clear scan of the patient after their teeth have been prepped
    • Adjacent preps not accepted
  • Upper and lower scans in bite relation
messages.aiCrownTreatmentNotesPartTwo:
You’ll get:
  • A crown design for each selected prepped tooth to be 3D printed in your office
  • A printable die for each crown that can be 3D printed to test the fit and margins
  • A treatment plan for each crown including occlusal heat map and margin line
messages.aiNightguardTreatmentNotesPartFour: If your case doesn’t meet all the requirements, request a manual design instead.
messages.aiNightguardTreatmentNotesPartOne: Use advanced SprintRay AI to get a night guard in just a few minutes.
messages.aiNightguardTreatmentNotesPartThree:
Requirements:
  • Upper and lower scans with an open or closed bite, exported in occlusion
  • Patient needs a basic flat plane night guard
  • All teeth are present in the patient scans
messages.aiNightguardTreatmentNotesPartTwo:
You’ll get:
  • One upper or lower night guard design file that you can 3D print in your office
messages.aiNightguardTreatmentNotesForNgComPartOn: The design will be ready for approval within a few minutes. After approval, it will ship within 48 hours.
messages.aiNightguardTreatmentNotesForNgComPartTw:
You’ll get:
  • Printed night guard shipped directly to your office
  • One night guard upper or lower night guard design file that you can 3D print it at any time
  • Night guard care instructions
messages.aiNightguardTreatmentNotesForNgComPartTh:
Requirements:
  • Upper and lower scans with an open or closed bite, exported in occlusion
  • Patient needs a flat plane night guard
  • All teeth are persent in the scans
messages.aiRetainerTreatmentNotesPartOne: Use AI to get a directly printable retainer in minutes. This treatment is compatible only with SprintRay Retainer.
messages.aiRetainerTreatmentNotesPartTwo:
You’ll get:
  • A retainer design that can be directly printed in your office. No thermoforming required.
messages.aiRetainerTreatmentNotesPartThree:
Requirements:
  • Compatible only with SprintRay Retainer for direct printing
  • Clear scan of the patient's teeth
messages.aiProccesFailed: L'algoritmo NightGuard non è stato in grado di elaborare correttamente. Richiedi una revisione e ricarica le scansioni. È possibile trovare i motivi comuni per AI Upper Nightguard non riusciti
messages.aiProgressFailedAiRetainerError: This scan has missing teeth, partial crowns, prepped teeth, or other issues that increase the complexity of the design. Please upload new files to proceed with the design.
messages.aiProccesFailedPartFour: • Sono presenti troppi buchi nelle scansioni e devono essere chiusi.
messages.aiProccesFailedPartOne: Non siamo stati in grado di elaborare correttamente le tue scansioni. Invia nuove scansioni dopo aver esaminato alcuni motivi comuni per le scansioni non riuscite:
messages.aiProccesFailedPartThree: • È necessario eseguire un ulteriore taglio per rimuovere i dati mobili.
messages.aiProccesFailedPartTwo: • Le scansioni non sono state salvate in occlusione.
messages.aiProcessFailedCheckFiles: We encountered an error while trying to read one or more of the files. Carefully check each scan to verify that you have uploaded the correct files, then click ‘Resubmit Files’ to reupload.
messages.aiProcessFailedReUpload: It looks like these scans may overlap. Check that scans are in occlusion and that you haven’t uploaded the same file for the upper and lower arch. Click ‘Resubmit Files’ to reupload.
messages.aiProcessFailedRetakeBiteScan: Night guard AI requires scans in occlusion to create a design. Click ‘Resubmit Files’ to reupload data with closed bite scans.
messages.aiProcessFailedRetakeScans: We detected issues with the integrity of the scan data that prevented us from designing a night guard. Retake scans slowly and click ‘Resubmit Files’ to upload new data.
messages.aiProcessFailedSwitchToManualDesign: This scan has missing teeth, partial crowns, prepped teeth, or other issues that increase the complexity of the design. Click ‘Manual Design’ to switch to a manual design for this patient.
messages.aiReviseFailedSwitchToManualDesign: Looks like you’ve used your free AI revision, so we recommend changing this to a manual design. We’ll deliver a design within 6 hours of submission.

messages.cbtDescriptionPartOne: I nostri speciali modelli CBT sono dotati di una trincea unica creata tra il margine gengivale e i denti (in attesa di brevetto). Questo design speciale aiuta il materiale del vassoio (foglio) a entrare nello spazio della trincea durante la sottovuoto e crea una cresta sul vassoio che viene spinto tra la gengiva e i denti.
messages.cbtDescriptionPartTwo: Questa cresta aiuta il vassoio a chiudere ermeticamente i denti, impedendo che il materiale sbiancante fuoriesca dal vassoio e impedisce anche alla saliva di entrare nel vassoio.
